ygData.subject: Re: Unicorn Horn announced at The Concert Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Last night at an event in Unrest (an ogre warrior, a troll shaman, a dark elf cleric, and a gnome rogue (GMs) decided to claim the mansion for themselves),
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 20 Sep 1999, David Lendrum wrote:

> Well other than the light source effect it has no noticeable effects
> unfortunately (Other than a greater lightstone type light)
> Karnek D'Jester
> L48 Bard of Erollisi Marr

Last night at an event in Unrest (an ogre warrior, a troll shaman, a dark
elf cleric, and a gnome rogue (GMs) decided to claim the mansion for
themselves), I happened upon a higher level bard with this little trinket.
I asked him about it, and he told me along with the light source it also
has five charges of Purge. He didn't mention what Purge does, nor if it
were possible to recharge the horn.

Athren Notechaser, anxious for his chains
